name: Jumbo Coconut Shrimp
ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined 1 cup all-‐purpose flour
1 cup panko bread crumbs 1/2 tablespoon onion powder
1 cup shredded sweetened coconut 1/2 tablespoon granulated garlic powder
4 large eggs Zesty Dipping Sauce, recipe follows
steps: Peanut oil, for frying Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Preheat oil in a deep-‐fryer to 350 degrees F.
In medium bowl mix together panko and coconut. In another medium bowl beat eggs and dash of salt and
pepper. In a third bowl mix flour, onion and garlic powder together. Dredge shrimp in flour, then eggs, then the
Place in preheated deep-‐fryer and fry, in batches, until crisp and golden brown; 2 to 3 minutes. Drain on a paper
towel-‐lined sheet tray. Serve hot with Zesty Dipping Sauce on the side.
Mix all ingredients in a small bowl.
